price: Огоҳ бошед! Онон [табаҳкор ва] муфсиданд, вале намефаҳманд
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
